description: Application for a Non-Material amendment to planning permission ref: P2018/1773/S73 dated 09 October 2018 for the variation of the wording of condition 14 (Refuse/recycling enclosures for phase 2 of the development) to refer to the revised drawings indicating an amended layout of the refuse and recycling enclosures as approved by this consent.
decision_conditions:
The wording of condition 14 attached to P2018/1773/S73 should now read as follows:

CONDITION: The dedicated refuse / recycling enclosure(s) shown as part of phase 2 of the development on approved plans shall be provided prior to the first occupation of phase 2 of the development hereby approved and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

The refuse and recycling enclosures and waste shall be managed and carried out at all times in accordance with the details of the approved 'site waste management plan' and drawings ref: 13_SW_0411 revD; and 13_SW_0450 revE.

REASON: To secure the necessary physical waste enclosures to support the development and to ensure that responsible waste management practices are adhered to.
